title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO ENTER INTO A MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT (MOA) WITH LOS BANOS- BAYOG SENIOR HIGH SCHOOL (LB-BSHS) FOR THEIR WORK IMMERSION PROGRAM (WIP) FOR SCHOOL YEAR 2025-2026. Author
